lead_paragraph: More than 200 administrative employees are being laid off and another 180 already-vacant positions will be closed, the district said.
snippet: More than 200 administrative employees are being laid off and another 180 already-vacant positions will be closed, the district said.

headline.main: Illinois: Chicago Cuts Public School Jobs

abstract: Chicago Public Schools district announces over 200 administrative employees will be laid off and 180 already-vacant positions will be closed, which will save city $45.1 million per year.
